Scott Stirling wrote:

> Yep, same root problem (different symptom) as when you use JAXP classes
> under the same conditions: the JUnit ClassLoader doesn't always delegate to
> the parent when it should.


Thanks for the reply -- I found the answer in the list archives when yahoo 
eventually became available again.  Evidently there is some hope that the 
problem will become resolved/resolvable in JDK1.4.
